body: Hi Camila, The problem is that the simulation of 10-10 was not taking the period properly. I think it got confused as a period from 10 to 10 is not exactly a period but an instant. If you change it to an HOY it works [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/llVO6PYtbd6s9-BqBDjSnuSDPZVOlLGLF21Db1tKrOp9AUxAIt4q7ZYHVg8Xu2TBedCOr5Yky40q8vAmuLB6t6V6t3b*HWvz/HOY.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/llVO6PYtbd7Llf0J1vzAUgfsv28URPYzHW4axbH5TamvLG2GEKxoAUhuNg*2kd0YXlE-HJaFquCyUoTu8c95-0YcfLZ7HX5X/HOYdifference.PNG) Your results wont be the same as mine, as I didn't have an epw from Sao Paulo, so I used one from London  You will find the things I added grouped. Hope it helps. Julia Edit: I guess if you keep it as you had it before my change but you put in the period from 9 to 10 it will work.
